com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster

Class ClusterNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.ClusterNode

  • public final class ClusterNode
extends Object
    Instances of this class represent nodes in the HA cluster and are composed of:
    • A name, corresponding to the value of attribute id of element ClusterNode in the HA configuration.
    • An integer identity (I).
    • A socket endpoint which is a wrapper around a socket address.
    • A ClusterSite which represents the site where this cluster node is located.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_LMA_PORT
      Default value for the port number on which the LMA is listening on cluster nodes: 10002.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusterNode

        public ClusterNode(String name,
                   Integer i,
                   byte dataVersionID,
                   SocketEndpoint endpoint,
                   boolean isLocalNode,
                   boolean automaticFailover,
                   boolean processReplayRequests,
                   int synchronizationWindow,
                   int lmaPort,
                   ClusterSite site,
                   String multicastNetworkInterfaceName)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - this cluster node's name
        i - this cluster node's I
        dataVersionID - this cluster node's data version ID
        endpoint - this cluster node's socket endpoint
        isLocalNode - whether this cluster node is the local node
        automaticFailover - whether this cluster node can fail-over automatically
        processReplayRequests - whether this cluster node processes replay requests from other nodes
        synchronizationWindow - the node's synchronization window
        lmaPort - the port on which the LMA is listening on this cluster node
        site - represents the site where this cluster node is located
        multicastNetworkInterfaceName - the network interface name on which multicast datagrams are sent and received

      • ClusterNode

        public ClusterNode(String name,
                   Integer i,
                   byte dataVersionID,
                   SocketEndpoint endpoint,
                   boolean isLocalNode,
                   boolean automaticFailover,
                   boolean processReplayRequests,
                   ClusterSite site)
        Constructor. Constructs a new ClusterNode that uses the default LMA port (10002).
        Parameters:
        name - this node's name
        i - this node's I
        dataVersionID - this cluster node's data version ID

        public boolean doesAutomaticFailover()
        Returns:
        true iff. this cluster node can fail-over automatically

      • isProcessingReplayRequests

        public boolean isProcessingReplayRequests()
        Return whether this cluster node is currently processing replay requests from other nodes.

        Note that this value may be different from the configured value.

        Returns:
        true iff. this cluster node is currently processing replay requests from other nodes.
        See Also:
        setProcessingReplayRequests(boolean)

      • synchronizationWindow

        public int synchronizationWindow()
        Return the cluster node's current synchronization window.

        Note that this value may be different from the configured value.

        Returns:
        The maximum number of missed updates per distributed collection which may be resynchronized.
        See Also:
        setProcessingReplayRequests(boolean)

      • setProcessingReplayRequests

        public void setProcessingReplayRequests(boolean value)
        Set whether this cluster node is currently processing replay requests from other nodes.

        This method overrides the configured value when queried via isProcessingReplayRequests().

        Parameters:
        value - True to enable replay request processing, false to disable it.

      • setSynchronizationWindow

        public void setSynchronizationWindow(int value)
        Set whether this cluster nodes current synchronization window.

        This method overrides the configured value when queried via synchronizationWindow().

        Parameters:
        value - The current synchronization window.

      • restoreDefaults

        public void restoreDefaults()
        Restores the default (i.e. configured) values for processReplayRequests and synchronizationWindow.

      • getLMAPort

        public int getLMAPort()
        Returns:
        the port on which the LMA is listening on this cluster node

      • getSite

        public ClusterSite getSite()
        Returns:
        the ClusterSite representing the site where this cluster node is located

      • getMulticastNetworkInterfaceName

        public String getMulticastNetworkInterfaceName()
        Returns:
        the multicast network interface name, or null if no multicast network interface is configured
